releaseNotes: ⚖️ Justice Performance System - Fair scoring that balances delays with overtime work
🔄 Fully Automatic Calculations - Performance and shift data auto-update from real records
📊 Net Hours Column - Shows effective work time after subtracting delays
💰 Overtime Bonus System - Rewards dedication with performance score bonuses
🎯 Smart Performance Formula - Delay penalties balanced by overtime rewards
🏆 Fair Employee Evaluation - Justice for hardworking employees with overtime
🔥 Enhanced Work Timer and overtime timer - counts UP with fire emoji and red styling
